thread.section_title: SecureDataRecovery.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SecureDataRecovery.com | securedatarecovery.com
thread.title: Bobby Parry

author: Bobby Parry
title: Bobby Parry
text:
I highly recommend Secure Data Recovery who was able to recover all of my data from my corrupted raid configuration for my corporation.
In addition it was a pleasure to work with their dedicated account representative Mr. Mitchell Moore, who kept me informed throughout every step, ensuring a smooth and painless process!
Thank you,
Sincerely,
Robert L. Parry, Administrator
